All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Battle
Abstract class that models the common functionality of a battle.
Battles
Class that models the construction of the Battle's used in the application.
BattleScreen
A screen used to run a battle from a GameEnvironment.
BattleSelectionScreen
A screen used to select a battle from a GameEnvironment.
CmdLineUi
A command line user interface for a GameEnvironment.
GameEnvironment
Manages the Monster Fighter application.
GameEnvironment.Difficulty
Represents the difficulty of a game.
GameEnvironmentUi
Defines a user interface (UI) for a GameEnvironment.
GameOverScreen
A screen used to display the end game information of a GameEnvironment
Gui
A graphical user interface that links to a GameEnvironment Class adapted from the Gui class in the seng201 RocketManager example project.
InventoryRenderer
Custom renderer for the inventory JList in a InventoryScreen.
InventoryScreen
A screen used to access a player's inventory through a GameEnvironment
Item
Class that models an item
Item.Stat
Represents the stat that an Item affects.
Main
Class where application execution begins.
MainScreen
A screen used to access the main functions of a GameEnvironment
Monster
Class that models a monster
Monster.Status
Represents the state of a Monster.
Monster.Type
Represents the type of a Monster.
PartyScreen
A screen used to access a player's party through a GameEnvironment
Player
Class that models a player
PlayerTest
 
Purchasable
Models the purchasable interface that allows an object to be bought from a Shop and sold for gold
RandomEvent
Class that models random events that can occur when a player rests in the monster fighter application
Screen
Defines common behaviour supported by a gui screen.
SetupScreen
A screen used to setup a GameEnvironment
Shop
Class that models a shop
ShopRenderer
Custom renderer for the shop JList in a ShopScreen.
ShopScreen
A screen used to access a shop inventory through a GameEnvironment
ShopTest
 
StartingMonstersRenderer
Custom renderer for the starting monsters JList in a SetupScreen.
TrainerBattle
Class that models a trainer battle
WildBattle
Class that models a wild battle
